title: Mate Abduction
description:
Sometimes love comes with a tail.
Clarabelle might have been kidnapped from Earth years ago but she never forgot her roots. Her restlessness leads to her embarking on a quest to find a human colony. Instead, she encounters an alien dude, Thyos, who insists she’s his mate.Ha. As if she’s going to settle down.Clarabelle isn’t about to take orders from anyone. Not even the alien hottie who has a disturbing tendency of shifting into a giant lizardman. Her idea of a happily ever after doesn’t include a tail or glowing yellow eyes.What will it take for her to accept his love and become his fated mate?PS: This book finally shows us what happened to orphan Clarabelle, whom you originally met in Dual Abduction.Note: ***Available from March 10 to April 10, 2020 in a supersized anthology called Loved in Space***Single book release on April 11, 2020!** ** *** ** **Alien Abduction series:Book 1: Accidental Abduction (Megan & Tren)Book 2: Intentional Abduction (Aylia & Jaro)Book 3: Dual Abduction (Louisa & Brax & Xarn)Book 4: Mercenary Abduction (Olivia & Makl)Book 5: Heroic Abduction (Betty & Dyre)Book 6: Holiday Abduction (Jilly & Vhyl)Book 7: Reader Abduction (Brigitte & Phyr)Book 8: Reverse Abduction (Azteriya & Jedrek) Book 9: Mate Abduction (Clarabelle & Thyos)
author: Eve Langlais
